google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Unfortunately you cannot import statistics from other apps.
In the Statistics page there's a "+"button for adding sessions.
In the list view of the Statistics page, you can select completed sessions by long-pressing on them. In the basic version you can delete them and in the pro version you can also edit the label, duration and time of completion.
